Title: Relates to joint certification of certified community behavioral health clinics
Summary: Provides for administrative review when applying for an additional certification by applicants to become certified community behavioral health clinics if such applicant is already certified by either the department of mental health or the office of addiction services and supports and is in good standing for five or more years.
LawCode: Amd ยง36.04, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to joint certification of certified community behavioral health clinics
